title: Cream of Courgette Soup
ingredients: ['450g courgette, diced', '65g celery, chopped', '125g carrots, chopped', '80g onion, diced', '110g margarine', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '425ml milk', '1 (295g) tin cream of mushroom condensed soup', '300ml water', '2 cubes chicken stock', '125ml dry white wine (optional)', '125ml soured cream']
